message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.SY, cs.PF 

The paper discusses the performance scaling of large-scale data centres, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). It also explores the effects of network topology on performance, which is related to Networked and Internet-based Systems (cs.NI) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). The paper also mentions the desire for automated self-configuration and failure-recovery, which falls under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the scaling properties of middleware, which is related to Performance (cs.PF).
